Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、昨日の夜、 また妙な寝言を言っていたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, you said something strange in your sleep again last night.

Entry.JapaneseText: 妙な寝言ってどんなの？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of weird sleep talk was it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ボクは生まれた」とか、「この広い世界を見て 聞く」とか意味不明の事をな。
Entry.EnglishText: You were saying incomprehensible stuff like "I was born," and "I am to see and hear this vast world."

Entry.JapaneseText: 生まれた時の夢でも見てたのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe it was a dream of when I was born?

Entry.JapaneseText: 赤ん坊の時の夢か？ もしかして、記憶が戻ったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You were dreaming of when you were a baby? Perhaps your memories are coming back?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、全然。 だって夢自体覚えてないもん。
Entry.EnglishText: No, not really. I don't ever remember the dream itself.
